ALL CARGO LOGISTICS

All Cargo Logistics is a major player in ImpEx Transport. They have more than 300 clients across globe and are into Over Dimensional Cargo, Project Cargo and Contract Cargo.

We created an extensive website with more than 50 unique pages and 100 landing pages.

We also integrated their website with their ERP system to enable tracking and tracing of cargo online.
